biotools.summary: Tool for processing and mining Expressed Sequence Tag (EST) trace files. It can help characterize 3&apos, and 5&apos, termini of cDNA inserts by detecting sequence features such as vector fragments, adapter/linker sequences, insert-flanking restriction endonuclease recognition sites, and polyA or polyT tails.

bioschemas.name: WebTraceMiner
bioschemas.summary: Tool for processing and mining Expressed Sequence Tag (EST) trace files. It can help characterize 3&apos, and 5&apos, termini of cDNA inserts by detecting sequence features such as vector fragments, adapter/linker sequences, insert-flanking restriction endonuclease recognition sites, and polyA or polyT tails.
